title: Art Project Brewing

description: Editing furiously! This video project is rendering and will be available for viewing soon. Please be patient!

description: Animating some cool stuff! The final motion graphics piece will be here before you know it. Thanks for waiting!

description: Currently pushing pixels around until it looks like art. Please stand by.

description: The audio and video are having a slight disagreement. Mediating the conflict now. Be patient!

title: Chasing a Bug
description: There's a bug in the code, and it's faster than I am. I'll get it eventually. Still working on it!

title: Choosing a Color Palette
description: It's either this shade of beige or that shade of beige. A critical decision is being made. Please be patient.

description: Looking for that one perfect clip of a cat... I mean, a client-appropriate asset. Still working on it!

description: Trying to center a div. This might take a while. Your patience is appreciated.

description: Staring at a blank canvas is part of the process, right? Working on it. Be patient.

title: Responsive Design Fun
description: It looks great on my monitor. Now to check the other 300 screen sizes. Please be patient.
